content.query:
SELECT
patient.gender AS Patient_Gender,
patient.status AS Patient_Marital_Status,
SUM(cast(claim_main.total_value as BIGINT)) AS Sum_Of_Claim_Total_Value,
COUNT_BIG(claim_main.total_value) AS Count_of_Claims
FROM fhir.PatientIdentifier AS patient
INNER  JOIN
(
SELECT
patient_id_reference
FROM fhir.ObservationMain 
INNER JOIN fhir.Observation_code
ON ObservationMain.observation_id = observation_code.observation_id
WHERE
observation_code.code_text='Pain severity - 0-10 verbal numeric rating [Score] - Reported'
AND ObservationMain.valuequantity_value IN (8,9,10)
GROUP BY patient_id_reference
) AS observation
ON patient.patient_id = observation.patient_id_reference
LEFT JOIN fhir.claims_main AS claim_main
ON patient.patient_id = claim_main.patient_id_reference
WHERE
cast(claim_main.billablePeriod_start as date) >='01-01-2020 00:00:00' AND cast(claim_main.billablePeriod_start as date) <'12-31-2021 00:00:00'
GROUP BY
patient.gender,
patient.status
ORDER BY
patient.gender,
patient.status
